description: Numbers n such that string 4,1 occurs in the base 9 representation of n but not of n+1.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n,9],{4,1}]>0,1,0],{n,3000}],{1,0}]][[1]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 28 2016 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
